import React, {useRef, useEffect, useState} from 'react' import {gsap, TweenMax, Power3} from 'gsap' import Navigation from '../components/Navigation.js' import Footer from '../components/Footer.js' import '../css/About.css' import mypic from '../css/imgs/mypic.jpg' function About() { let graphContainer = useRef(null) let div1 = useRef(null) let div2 = useRef(null) let div3 = useRef(null) let div4 = useRef(null) useEffect(() => { TweenMax.to(graphContainer, 0, {css: {visibility:'visible'}}) TweenMax.staggerFrom( [div1,div2,div3,div4], 0.8, {opacity: 0, x: -100, ease: Power3.easeOut}, .2 ) }, []) return (
graphContainer = el}>

I'm a Full-Stack Software Developer based in San Francisco, California

div1 = el}>
div2 = el}>
div3 = el}>
div4 = el}>
) } export default About;
